cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Foreign Affairs on July 28, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 8453, Upholding the Dayton Peace Agreement Through Sanctions Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 120 (Wednesday, July 20, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. WAGNER:
H.R. 8453.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the Constitution of the United
States
[Page H6923]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

title: Upholding the Dayton Peace Agreement Through Sanctions Act
